abilities.name: Executioner's Entourage
abilities.timing: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.description: Though Royal Decapitators are often shunned by their fellow ghouls, when the blood starts flying, these sinister figures can attract quite the following.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Serfs unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Off With Their Head!
abilities.description: A Royal Decapitator's axe hungers to cleave through necks in one fell swing.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry Hero that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit's attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, the target is automatically destroyed.

battleProfile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Royal Attendant.
